title: House Panel Subpoenas DHS Over Trump’s Alleged Pardon Offer
text:
WASHINGTON—The House Judiciary committee has subpoenaed the Department of Homeland Security for documents that could shed light on President Trump’s alleged offer to pardon government officials who break the law to construct his desired border wall by the 2020 election.

Mr. Trump has denied that he has offered pardons to any officials involved in border-wall construction. The Washington Post, citing current and former officials involved with the border plans, reported Aug 27 that the president mentioned the pardons in private...
